snippet.title: Clawberta - Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now!
https://hyperbeard.com/game/clawberta/install

Discover amazing toy surprises with the raddest claw machine to ever enter the arcade... Clawberta! 

- Unlock hundreds of the cutest toys from exciting places all around the world! 
- Dress up Clawberta with trendy hair styles and discover interesting puzzles with every machine. 
- Complete your toy collections for a special bonus and unlock new machines to extend the fun!!!

Clawberta requires read/write access to external storage in order to save your progress locally on your device. This ensures that every toy you open, stays in your collection. Clawberta also utilizes cloud save so that you can safely transfer data across devices.

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

This game is not intended for children and may have some content that is inappropriate for children under the age of 13.
